tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    meeting_notes TEXT,
    action_items JSONB
);
CREATE TABLE meetings (meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY, meeting_date DATE, meeting_notes TEXT) CREATE TABLE action_items (action_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY, meeting_id INT, action_description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE meeting_notes (meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    team_member_id INT,
    meeting_notes TEXT,
    action_items TEXT)

CREATE TABLE team_members (team_member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_member_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE action_items (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    assigned_to INT,
    item_description VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(20))

CREATE TABLE MeetingNotes (
  note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  note_text TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES TeamMembers(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ActionItems (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  item_description TEXT,
  assigned_to INT,
  completed BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES MeetingNotes(meeting_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (assigned_to) REFERENCES TeamMembers(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Meeting_Notes (
  note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  note_content TEXT,
  created_by VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  meeting_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Action_Items (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_description TEXT,
  assigned_to VARCHAR(255),
  due_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Team_Members (
  member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  meeting_notes_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_notes_id) REFERENCES Meeting_Notes(note_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Collaboration (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES Meetings(meeting_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES Action_Items(item_id)
)
